snippet.title: Whisper Mountain Outbreak  - Demo Gameplay Reveal
snippet.description:
Exclusive premiere of Whisper Mountain Outbreak public demo on Steam!
Available for a limited time only on October 26, 2023, at 10 am PDT

Wishlist on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1953230/Whisper_Mountain_Outbreak/

Toge Productions' first-ever isometric survival horror game! Play it solo or online co-op. It's 1998, and an ancient curse has been unleashed, trapping everyone on Mount Bisik.

Explore abandoned buildings, fight monsters, scavenge resources, craft items, solve puzzles, and figure out a way to escape the whispering madness.

Fight, explore, solve puzzles, and figure out a way to escape... together!

- - - - - - - - - -

Wishlist on Steam!
- https://store.steampowered.com/app/1953230/Whisper_Mountain_Outbreak/

Follow on social media!
- https://twitter.com/WMOgame
- https://www.facebook.com/WMOgame
- https://www.instagram.com/wmogame/
